testsuite.name: Buffer Service Implementation Tests

testcase.name: Buffer exists - Negative: Device doesn't belong to client
Get buffers by client - Negative: Device service returns error
Get buffers by connection scheme - Positive
Create buffer - Negative: Device doesn't belong to client
Create buffer - Negative: Buffer already exists
Get buffers by client - Negative: Device service timeout
Buffer exists - Negative: Buffer not found
Update buffer - Negative: Cannot change buffer UID
Delete buffer from connection scheme - Positive
Delete all buffers from connection scheme - Positive
